segments.text: Does Mr . Schmidt know he's going to become a father ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , and I have no way of getting ahold of him ! There's no phone where he's at !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , he has a surprise waiting for him when he gets back , doesn't he !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My older sister Judy will be here soon to help . She already has a boy and a girl of her own ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just saw a red van pulling into the driveway . Is that her ?
segments.speaker: S1
